title: Umi Monogatari: Anata ga Ite Kureta Koto (Umi Monogatari)
synopsis: Marin and her younger sister Urin are seafolk who happen upon something quite strange: a beautiful silver ring lost beneath the waves. The kind-hearted Marin, intent on returning it to its owner, drags a reluctant Urin along with her to the sky world despite reminders of a turtle elder who left for the surface and never returned. After locating the ring's owner, Kanon Miyamori, they learn that Kanon had tossed it into the sea after her boyfriend dumped her earlier that day.
related_anime: ['Umi Monogatari: Kanon to Iku Amamikoshima', 'Umi Monogatari: Anata ga Ite Kureta Koto - Shinjiau Kokoro', 'Umi Monogatari: Anata ga Ite Kureta Koto', 'Umi Monogatari: Marin no Kore Naani?']
